"},{"id":186,"type":"Fake gambling/betting site","victim":"| steamname: royski4 - CSGOFunPot.com | steam3ID: [U:1:137487346] | steamID32: STEAM_0:0:68743673 | steamID64: http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198097753074 | customURL: http://steamcommunity.com/id/royski4/ | steamrep: http://steamrep.com/profiles/76561198097753074 ","accused":"Invalid SteamID","description":"This person added me to their friends list and since he claimed to be Polish , which is where I come from so I wanted to see why he wanted to add me. I went on chat, and he immediately told me he is an admin of CSGO jackpot site and he can easilly help me win by rigging the results. I responded in Polish as to why he is trying to scam me and asked him to read my profile info that says I do not accept requests from people that have anything to do with gambling. He responded with something similiar to the Polish word Thank You which is spelled Dziekuje, and as you can see he did not spell that right, but phonetically. This leads me to the conclusion that he does not live in Poland, and perhaps this is someone impersonating a genuine user from Poland, as well as with the tons of good +rep for trade he might be trying to scam people that way too. This is my first report , hope this is enough proof with the two screenshots I made, if not, please ask any questions anytime. I decided to now make a report about every scammer I encounter as since I started playing CSGO I have a lot of blocked people and not even 1/3rd been reported/have a steamrep or FOG ban. All the best, Raf, royski4","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/439fbd6ee1d8aeb12ddc53bb0g8912ba https://files.f-o-g.eu/77fggdc9g9474a3be3ae4g726eaf419g ","views":55,"protected":0,"locked":1,"state_id":9,"assignee_id":null,"creator_id":84,"modificator_id":84,"created_at":"07.09.2016 04:37:29","updated_at":"2016-09-07 10:31:46","state":"Invalid","assignee":"

"},{"id":969,"type":"PayPal scam or scam attempt","victim":"| steamname: gay | steam3ID: [U:1:226881883] | steamID32: STEAM_0:1:113440941 | steamID64: http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198187147611 | customURL: http://steamcommunity.com/id/ | steamrep: http://steamrep.com/profiles/76561198187147611 ","accused":"76561198273523808 (Dalarin cs.money)","description":"Gay (the victim) and I with one of our friends were playing a csgo comp match on dust 2 when we met dalarin, he was a chill guy, he had some nice skins and was all around nice, and after playing for a little while he asked gay if they could trade, 120 paypal for his Well Worn Gut knife Black Laminate which is about 80 dollars and his Statrack Factory new usp-s caiman which is about 20 dollars on opskins. So we went into a discord call and talked about how we were gunna do this and i looked at all his +reps in his profile comments and saw that they were all from people with active account that looked legit and i went on to his steam rep profile and didn't see any thing fishy and he even showed us proof that he was a trust worthy guy, showing gay pictures of previous trades that he had done with people that were for lots and lots of money. So we all thought he was trust worthy and gay traded with him, losing his gut knife and his st fn usp-s caiman. ","evidence":"http://files.f-o-g.eu/9402f463a77fffc2d739ffaebg730gfe Jamessmude007 is gays email.
